title: How to Make Agua De Jamaica

steps.headline: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil.
Add 1/2 cup Flor de Jamaica and 1/2 cup sugar.
steps.description: If adding ginger, add it to the mixture at this point, also, to taste.

steps.headline: Allow mixture to boil for about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Cover and allow to steep for about 10 minutes.
Strain this infusion into a separate container, add the remaining 4 cups of cold water, and mix well.
steps.description: If adding rum, mix in at this step.

steps.headline: To serve immediately, pour over ice.
steps.description: Otherwise, allow it to cool in the refrigerator until it is time to serve.

text: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil.  Add 1/2 cup Flor de Jamaica and 1/2 cup sugar. If adding ginger, add it to the mixture at this point, also, to taste. Allow mixture to boil for about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Cover and allow to steep for about 10 minutes.  Strain this infusion into a separate container, add the remaining 4 cups of cold water, and mix well. If adding rum, mix in at this step. To serve immediately, pour over ice. Otherwise, allow it to cool in the refrigerator until it is time to serve. Enjoy your cultural beverage!
